Well, the bad news is I am still not completely happy with the 1st 
scenario I created in this series.  I know what the scenario has to 
be to fit into the plans, but I am just not happy with it.  Yes, it is 
the 1st one where the player actually gets help.  I will test it again 
with the new changes I have made to see if I am finally happy with it. 
 If I finally become happy with it, I will be working on some more new 
ones.

Side notes:  interestingly enough, I am getting around to giving the 
player some help (NPCs) in some scenarios.

One thing I have noticed about skeletons: when they shoot out their 
bones, they never use up any magic power, even at experience level 1.

Faeries vs Skeletons for which is easiest:  skeletons are a joke if 
you have an experienced cleric to take care of them.

I know there is a most powerfull character in the game (archmage), so 
it seems to me that logically there must be a weakest character.  Yes, 
the outcome of this debate will effect a future scenario I am going to 
build for the sole purpose of testing mega (experience level 100 and 
higher) hired characters.  That scenario will be the absolute easiest 
scenario ever (without NPCS) and filled up lots and lots of gold.

Tevildo, take your time.
